title: 2013-14 patch (v1.3.2) for FIFA 11
description:
2013-14 patch (v1.3.2) for FIFA 11


included:
- FIFA 11 Selector:
* NEW: Updater added
--> checks automaticly for updates when selector opened
--> advice what version to install
--> see list, what is installed/avaible
* NEW: Arena > Stadium : stadium-preview window added
* improvements & fixes, ...

- Squads
[Default squads (Updated)]
* updated transfers
* FIFA 15 demo: updated players/formations (only Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City, Borussia Dortmund, Napoli, Paris Saint-Germain, FC Barcelona)


- stadiums:
6 Brazilian stadiums added (team linked only at offline version)
* Arena da Baixada (AtlÃƒÂ©tico Paranaense)
* Arena Corinthians (Corinthians)
* Fonte Nova (Esporte Clube Bahia)
* EstÃƒÂ¡dio Beira-Rio (Sport Club Internacional)
* MineirÃƒÂ£o (Cruzeiro Esporte Clube)
* EstÃƒÂ¡dio do MaracanÃƒÂ£ (brazil national team, Flamengo, Fluminense, Botafogo)


- kits 
FIFA 15 demo files, Home/away/GK kits (+ FIFA 15 minis)
* Chelsea
* Liverpool
* Manchester City
* Borussia Dortmund
* Napoli
* Paris Saint-Germain
* FC Barcelona

- 2013-14 kits avaible (when 2013-14 Squads selected)


- Commentaries:
* Fix: New added commentary not avaible ingame


- Shoes
* Warrior Skreamer II - S-Lite Blue Infinity/Astro Turf/Laser Blue/Hi
* Warrior Skreamer II - S-Lite White/Magnet/Micro Chip/Shocking Orange
* adidas F50 adiZero TRX - Solar Green Solar Blue
* adidas F50 adiZero TRX - White Metallic Gold
* Lotto Solista III - Reflective SilverFluo Fanta


- files (lua files)
* unused functions removed (lighter & better performance)
* added function: assign tournament stadiums





Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, Russian


Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)
3. install 2013-14 patch (v1.1)
4. install 2013-14 patch (v1.3)

5. install 2013-14 patch (v1.3.2)

Notes
- patch v1.1 & v1.3 NEEDED (v1.3.1 included)
- ! After install: use the selector to apply the new squads
- Updater: selector > about > update...



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
